mapper.sql: integral_info_id, user_id, got_total, current_total, create_at, update_at
mapper.select: SELECT userId, SUM( IF ( integralType = 1 OR integralType = 2, integralAmount, 0 )) getOfferTotal, SUM( IF ( integralType = 1 OR integralType = 2 OR integralType = 5, integralAmount, 0 )) getConsumeTotal, gotTotal, currentTotal FROM ( SELECT a.integral_info_id integralInfoId, a.user_id userId, a.current_total currentTotal, a.got_total gotTotal, b.integral_log_type integralType, b.integral_amount integralAmount FROM `czb_integral_info` a LEFT JOIN czb_integral_log b ON a.user_id = b.user_id ) AS fnd WHERE fnd.userId = #{userId} GROUP BY fnd.gotTotal, fnd.currentTotal
mapper.update: UPDATE czb_integral_info SET user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, got_total = #{gotTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, current_total = #{currentTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE integral_info_id = #{integralInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select current_total beforeIntegralAmount, integral_info_id integralInfoId from czb_integral_info where user_id = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
